item.title: MySQL
item.description: MySql学习 启动相关 /etc/init.d/mysqld start /etc/init.d/mysqld stop /etc/init.d/mysqld restart service mysqld restart service mysqld stop service mysqld start 其他命令 mysql -uoot -pP@ssw0rd hf-csa -default-character-set=utf8 < db_qdn672.sql Mysql Dump dump数据库 mysqldump -uroot -p hf-csa > hf-csa.sql 只dump数据库表结构（--no-d
